title: RAIN & a car journey you had

singleItemContent: Does it rain much in your city?
Would like to live in a place that Is dry or wet?
Would you change your plan if it rained?
Describe a car journey you had
Who you had the car journey with
And explain how you felt about the journey
What benefits does public transport bring to the world?
